nodes.text: Heir to the Empire, Limited Edition Hardcover is a special hardcover volume that collects all six issues from the Heir to the Empire series of comics based on the novel Heir to the Empire. Limited to 1,000 copies, the book features a special foil-stamped cover, a deluxe slipcase and a special tipped-in art plate signed by writer Mike Baron and artists Olivier Vatine and Fred Blanchard. The book was designed by Scott Tice and released on March 1, 1997.

This limited-edition, hardcover graphic novel adapts Timothy Zahn's best-selling novel, Star Wars: Heir to the Empire, to comic-book format. Featuring the entire 160-page epic and a special, tipped-in art plate including the signatures of Mike Baron, Olivier Vatine, and Fred Blanchard, this foil-stamped hardcover comes in a deluxe slipcase. For any Star Wars fan, it's an absolute must-buy item; but limited to only 1,000 copies, you can bet that only the most powerful Jedi will actually capture this treasure!
